channel.title: Daily Tech News Show
channel.itunes:author: Tom Merritt
channel.itunes:summary: Daily Tech News Show features host Tom Merrit and various guests discussing featured news stories from the world of tech.
channel.description: Daily Tech News Show features host Tom Merrit and various guests discussing featured news stories from the world of tech.

item.title: DTNS 2161 – Facebook Opens to Savings
item.itunes:summary: Ewen Rankin joins to chat about Microsoft’s next CEO, How Facebooks selfishness is helping everyone and its REAL purpose behind the new Paper app. MP3 Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. item.title: DTNS 2159 – Hothlanta
item.itunes:summary: Jonathan Strickland pops by to talk about Lenovo buying Motorola from Google, the man who lost his $50,000 Twitter account, and how the Air Force’s secret weather controlling array might get shut down. Or maybe it’s an ionosphere observation platform. SURE it is, secret government. MP3 Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. Please SUBSCRIBE […]
